ResultDataSet.Identifier: Stream Results\Traffic Group Results By Actual Rx Ports
ResultDataSet.Name: Traffic Group Results By Actual Rx Ports

RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.SqlString: select gc.GroupName as 'Traffic Group', tg.GroupName as 'Traffic Subgroup', eot.TxStreamBlockName as 'Stream Block', eot.TxStreamId as 'Stream Id', eot.TxStreamIndex as 'Stream Index', eot.TxFrameCount as 'Tx Count (Frames)', coalesce(sum(eot.FrameCount), 0) as 'Rx Count (Frames)', (TxOctetCount * 8) as 'Tx Count (bits)', coalesce(sum(OctetCount * 8), 0) as 'Rx Count (bits)', TxL1BitCount as 'Tx L1 Count (bits)', coalesce(sum(L1BitCount), 0) as 'Rx L1 Count (bits)', (case when (eot.TxFrameCount - coalesce(sum(eot.FrameCount), 0)) < 0 then '' else eot.TxFrameCount - sum(eot.FrameCount) end) as 'Tx-Rx (Frames)', (case when (eot.TxFrameCount - coalesce(sum(eot.FrameCount), 0)) < 0 then '' else round(cast(eot.TxFrameCount - coalesce(sum(eot.FrameCount), 0) as double) * 100.0 / eot.TxFrameCount, 5) end) as 'Tx-Rx (%)', coalesce(eot.DroppedFrameCount,0) as 'Dropped Frame Count', round(cast(coalesce(eot.DroppedFrameCount, 0) as double) * 100.0 / eot.TxFrameCount, 5) as 'Dropped Frame (%)', coalesce(round(cast(sum(eot.TotalLatency) / 100.0 as double) / sum(eot.SigFrameCount), 3), 0.0) as 'Avg Latency', coalesce(min(eot.MinLatency), 0.0) as 'Min Latency', coalesce(max(eot.MaxLatency), 0.0) as 'Max Latency', coalesce(eot.InSeqFrameCount, 0) as 'In Sequence Count (Frames)', coalesce(eot.OutSeqFrameCount, 0) as 'Out Of Sequence Count (Frames)', eot.TxCellCount as 'Tx Count (Cells)', coalesce(sum(eot.CellCount), 0) as 'Rx Count (Cells)' from GroupCollection as gc, TrafficGroup as tg, RelationTable as r, TxRxEotStreamResults as eot where eot.DataSetId = @DataSetId and tg.DataSetId = @DataSetId and gc.DataSetId = @DataSetId and r.DataSetId = @DataSetId and r.Type = 'AffiliationTrafficGroup' and r.SourceHnd = tg.Handle and r.TargetHnd = eot.TxParentStreamBlock and tg.ParentHnd = gc.Handle and eot.Comp32 > 0 and eot.ParentHnd > 0 group by tg.Handle, eot.Comp32, eot.ParentHnd
RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.CountQuery: select count (*) from (select eot.TxStreamId from GroupCollection as gc, TrafficGroup as tg, RelationTable as r, TxRxEotStreamResults as eot where eot.DataSetId = @DataSetId and tg.DataSetId = @DataSetId and gc.DataSetId = @DataSetId and r.DataSetId = @DataSetId and r.Type = 'AffiliationTrafficGroup' and r.SourceHnd = tg.Handle and r.TargetHnd = eot.TxParentStreamBlock and tg.ParentHnd = gc.Handle and eot.Comp32 > 0 and eot.ParentHnd > 0 group by tg.Handle, eot.Comp32, eot.ParentHnd)
RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.Name: RealTimeResultGroupDefinition 10
